short_summary: Maintenance and support for Nagios software.
description: The procurement is for the maintenance and support of Nagios software for Natural Resources Canada in Ottawa, Ontario. Bidders are required to submit their bids electronically due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

full_summary:
# Nagios Software Maintenance and Support for Natural Resources Canada

## Summary
Natural Resources Canada in Ottawa, Ontario, is seeking a contractor to provide Nagios Software Maintenance and Support. 

## Details
* **Reference Number**: SSC-22-00021021:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM017570/21021
* **Publication Date**: December 6, 2022
* **Closing Date**: December 20, 2022, 2:00 PM
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Request for Proposal
A Request for Quotation has been issued for Nagios Software Maintenance and Support. Bidders must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. Evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted.

## Important Notice to Suppliers
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority's email.

## Key Contact Information

* Title: Agnes Kowalska
* Email: [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 551-9034

## Attachments
View the Request for Quotation and download the attachments at:

* English: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/FD4DFB44-FF03-47E6-923D-1A53C00E8A54](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/FD4DFB44-FF03-47E6-923D-1A53C00E8A54)
* French: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/6FA5C8DA-5D7E-4AA9-8DDC-BA86FED4C0BA](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download/6FA5C8DA-5D7E-4AA9-8DDC-BA86FED4C0BA)  pools Rel<|reserved_special_token_93|>I have rewritten the text in a more professional manner, adher
